      int[][] getPossibleMoves(int gameID, int[] piecePosition)
      returns possible moves for a piece position return value looks like that [[x,y], [2,2], [2,3], [3,3]]
      Parameters:
      gameID - game id
      piecePosition - position of a piece
      Returns:
      2D array of possible positions [x,y]

      Parameters:

      previousPiecePosition - [x,y] position
      newPiecePosition - [x,y] position
      Returns:
